overview: The Oakley surf team displays a lot of talent and all its power in Retratum, a film that brings back memories and unforgettable moments of the surf trips of each one of its members.  With high definition images, the production goes through the best and most famous surf spots in the world, as well as unusual places like Colombia, Morocco and Galapagos.  Big names in Brazilian surfing invade the screen in a show of tubes and amazing maneuvers, such as Adriano de Souza, Danilo Costa, Jadson André, Miguel Pupo, Gilmar Silva, Caio Ibelli, Ítalo Ferreira, Leo Neves, André Pastori, Edgar Groggia, Charlie Brown, Sandino, Camilo Hornke, Rodrigo Sino and Eraldo Gueiros.  The film was included in the February/2009 issue of Fluir magazine.
title: Retratum
